mapper.select: select r.*, r.reader_id acc_id, acc.descrim acc_descrim, r.readee_id red_id, red.descrim red_descrim, wrt.id red_acc_id, wrt.descrim red_acc_descrim from t_read r left outer join t_account acc on r.reader_id = acc.id left outer join t_work red on r.readee_id = red.id left outer join t_account wrt on red.writer_id = wrt.id
